results.name: Bahman Ghobadi

roles_in_work.title: A Time for drunken horses = Zaman baraye masti asbha [DVD]
A Time for drunken horses = Zamani baraye masti asbha [Widescreen]

results.biography: Bahman Ghobadi (Persian: بهمن قبادی; Kurdish: به‌همه‌ن قوبادی, romanized: Behmen Qubadî; born 1 February 1969) is an Iranian Kurdish film director, producer and writer. He belongs to the  "new wave" of Iranian cinema.
